CIRCULAR 36/2000 
 
SUB: INSTALLATION OF CLIP 
 
 
 
Cases of hoax bomb calls by miscreants are very frequent causing precious loss of 
time and resulting in interference with civil aviation operations. While call tracing facilities 
have been provided on the telephones installed at the airports, the same have not been 
provided on the telephones of airlines at their city offices.  As a result, the miscreants who 
communicate such information on these telephones are not traced.  It has, therefore, been 
decided that in order to trace such hoax telephone calls, all airlines operators will equip their 
telephones at their city offices / residence of Station Managers with call tracing facility and 
details of all such telephones will be communicated to the RDCOS, BCAS to enable them to 
maintain proper record.  
 
  
 
 
 (R.K.Singh) 
ADDL.COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CA)
